org.apache.tephra.persist

Class NoOpTransactionStateStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • org.apache.tephra.persist.NoOpTransactionStateStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, TransactionStateStorage

    public class NoOpTransactionStateStorage
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements TransactionStateStorage
    Minimal TransactionStateStorage implementation that does nothing, i.e. does not maintain any actual state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

      • deleteLogsOlderThan

        public void deleteLogsOlderThan(long timestamp)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: TransactionStateStorage
        Removes any transaction logs with a timestamp older than the given value. Logs must be removed based on timestamp to ensure we can fully recover state based on a given snapshot.
        Specified by:
        deleteLogsOlderThan in interface TransactionStateStorage
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp to delete up to. Logs with a timestamp less than this value will be removed.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while removing logs.
